incident_updates.body: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Investigation is ongoing. Our teams have identified the root-cause and are preparing a fix. At this stage, the release of IP prefixes is possible through API and the Manager. Customers is still not able to order new BYOIP prefixes until further notice. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our BYOIP offer . Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 21/01/2026 08:00 UTC Impacted Service(s) : BYOIP delivery and release. Customers Impact : As a result, we have to stop provisioning new BYOIP prefixes. Customers will not be able to request new BYOIP ranges or release existing ones until a solution is identified. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our BYOIP offer. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 21/01/2026 08:00 UTC Impacted Service(s) : BYOIP delivery and release. Customers Impact : As a result, we have to stop provisioning new BYOIP prefixes. Customers will not be able to request new BYOIP ranges or release existing ones until a solution is identified. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 02/02/2026 05:00 UTC End time : 02/02/2026 16:00 UTC Service impact : During this maintenance, the cooling system's efficiency may be temporarily reduced for some servers, potentially lowering performance. Despite ongoing mitigation efforts, customers could still experience a temporary reboot or shutdown in the worst case. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.
